root: ^Yes. This court of houses will now decide the fate of the world.
^Let's just hope that it goes well.
^At this point, that's all we can do.
^I have made so many mistakes. My life has been dedicated to ensuring the safety of the world, now I have only made the world worse.
^I have hurt innocent life, and now those who decide if the world goes to war are those least deserving of power. All I can do now is watch.
^Yeah, that's tough. But even if this does go poorly, we can still do something.
^I can't imagine there would be anything left to do.
^Of course you can't. We have no way of knowing how this is going to play out, and it's only then that we can figure out what to do.
^You're right, but I'm not used to having no backup plan.
^I get it. I've lived my entire life without one. Whatever it is that we need to do, I'll have your back. I'll fight for you.
^I hated fighting for no good purpose. Fighting to help you save the world? Now that's something I can get behind.
^And once this mess is over, why don't you come with me?
^I've decided I'm going to follow my desires and perform across the world.
^Maybe what you need is a change of scenery. Leave home for a while. Come with me. See the world. We can do it together.

MAYBEIWILL: ^I'm so used to following such a strict structure. Maybe letting myself break out of that is a good thing.
^It might be nice to do something different, to allow myself to not know exactly what will happen.
^That's what it's all about! Letting life lead you on. If you don't know exactly what you're doing, you allow life to surprise you in the best ways.
ICANT: ^The people here rely on me. Once this mess is over, if it ever is, there is going to be enough chaos for a lifetime. I'll have to deal with it.
^Because it's my responsibility. I have to take care of everyone.
^I respect that, but make sure you're taking care of yourself, too.
^And let me know if you change your mind.
